A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Meh\, What happened to the Star Wars wow factor? I have been a die hard fan since I was a child in the 80's. The Prequel Saga wasn't the greatest but I felt had more of a complete story. When I saw the trailer to The Force Awakens\, all I could think of is \"Shut up and take my money\" and it did deliver to some extent. The Last Jedi has a very fragmented story with no organic connection in the story. Too many things happening at once and non of them make sense. I truly hope the writers and producers learn from this and step up their game for the final in this Saga. Also on a side note\, who is rating these on the critics side? 92% for this movie and only 41% for Justice league? Both suffer from the same story line issue. Fragmented and lack luster. I personal would give Justice League 80% and Star Wars: The Last Jedi 55%.
